hiveArticle.title: Color Challenge - Thursday Green - Greenery
hiveArticle.body:
My today's post about the Color Challenge is some glimpses of Green Park. It is so good to see the greenery all around and Green is also one of my favorite color. Its the color of nature and soothing in the eyes. So this weekend I have gone to a nearby park and its a big park with a lot of trees around it. Its one of the biggest park in Bangalore with lot of people come here for picnic.

### Bamboo Trees with Glimpse of Sun

![IMG_20180101_170028.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmP9RmvRd6WARjJy76anGiHdT4Lb332fmPPaV1PtfdU523/IMG_20180101_170028.jpg)

### Birds Enjoying their Time

![IMG_20180101_164730.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNWpCkq35sBg92Sx9RHJnBw4MBM8ZtPKGaE3vN7Gze5aG/IMG_20180101_164730.jpg)

### My Favorite Place to Sit

![IMG_20180101_165057.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYch2xcw8djjFxAE4jDrowr8HR7mmexgHUTL1excTfQyb/IMG_20180101_165057.jpg)
